content: We 'll start setting up regular calls for IG template updates - How to maintain our templates

for planning the calls, we should look at preferences for timezones to see who can join?
Here's a poll - any further suggestion is welcome:
I don't see a check box for the first time offered (9am eastern)

/poll Timezones for IG template calls
9 AM New York | 6 AM San Francisco | 11 PM Sydney | 3 PM Brussels
1 PM New York | 10 AM San Francisco | 3 AM Sydney | 7 PM Brussels
5 PM New York | 2 PM San Francisco | 7 AM Sydney | 11 PM Brussels
9 PM New York | 6 PM San Francisco | 11 AM Sydney | 3 AM Brussels
1 AM New York | 10 PM San Francisco | 3 PM Sydney | 7 AM Brussels
5 AM New York | 2 AM San Francisco | 7 PM Sydney | 11 AM Brussels
@Elliot Silver @John Moehrke apologies - please vote again
@Eric Haas @Sean McIlvenna
I thought of seeing who's interested from different time zones, then we can find a precise schedule
tricky from the southern hemisphere, since calls move around by two hours depending on the time of year. e.g. I can do an 11pm call but it would be 1am in summer, and that's no go
I would love to attend, but my calendar is a mess for the next (at least) month. So, I won't likely be able to attend until my calendar dies down a bit
@Lloyd McKenzie please vote / pick up from here.
@Nick George in case you are interested
I am! do you know what dates you'd roughly start?

/poll What timeslots can you regularly be available for?
Mondays 1 PM New York | 10 AM San Francisco | 7 PM Brussels | 3 AM Sydney (Tuesday)
Mondays 5 PM New York | 2 PM San Francisco | 11 PM Brussels | 7 AM Sydney (Tuesday)
Tuesdays 1 PM New York | 10 AM San Francisco | 7 PM Brussels | 3 AM Sydney (Wednesday)
Tuesdays 5 PM New York | 2 PM San Francisco | 11 PM Brussels | 7 AM Sydney (Wednesday)
Wednesdays 1 PM New York | 10 AM San Francisco | 7 PM Brussels | 3 AM Sydney (Thursday)
Fridays 5 PM New York | 2 PM San Francisco | 11 PM Brussels | 7 AM Sydney (Saturday)

These are based on what time-slots seem to work best from the previous poll and were the times that both Jose and I had available. Note that this poll is for the current Northern Hemisphere spring/summer/fall. We could potentially re-evaluate in Oct/Nov. when time zone alignments change.

It looks like the winner is Tuesdays 5 PM New York | 2 PM San Francisco | 11 PM Brussels | 7 AM Sydney (Wednesday).
I've set up the calls starting on July 6. Call details will be the usual FHIR-I link: https://hl7-org.zoom.us/j/8583747934?pwd=VnZiWFZsNm1TSk5QWmZlbVJyQVZGdz09
@Jose Costa Teixeira @Eric Haas @Elliot Silver @John Moehrke @Oliver Egger @Nick George
thanks, sorrry missed that, for the next time it is in the agenda
